paper_abstract: In this paper we study the Gelfand and Kolmogorov numbers of Sobolev embeddings between weighted function spaces of Besov and Triebel-Lizorkin type with polynomial weights. The sharp asymptotic estimates are determined in the so-called non-limiting case. (C) 2011 Elsevier Inc. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Gelfand and Kolmogorov numbers of Sobolev embeddings of weighted function spaces
